title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 116: Featuring Charlie McAvoy + Ryan Donato
description:
On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by Charlie McAvoy and Ryan Donato of the Boston Bruins. In what was a really fun interview, the guys talk about Ryan's time at the Olympics, Charlie's rookie season, the playoffs, playing in Boston and a ton more. The fellas also talk about the recent hit on Vancouver Canucks forward Elias Pettersson by Florida Panthers defenseman Mike Matheson. The boys also look around the league and open up the discussion of the best contracts in the league. Â 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
